oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sur la capitulation pour le module de Bertrandias-Payan
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jaulent, Jean-François
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Number Theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We compute the capitulation kernel for the module of Bertrandias-Payan in an arbitrary $\ell$-extension of number fields which satisfies the Leopoldt conjecture. As a consequence we relate the existence of extensions with trivial such module to the classical problem of locally cyclotomic towers.
